A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson is the Joel Schumacher of the Star Wars franchise.  This movie was terrible.  All the setup JJ did in the force awakens gets thrown away.  Rey is a Marry Sue and the movie has quite a few femenist/SJW theme going on.  The humor misses the mark.  Keep that in Guardians of the galaxy and let Star Wars continue to be Star Wars.  Speak with your wallets and see this when it's on red box\, along with future installments.  Sad day for Star Wars fans
